thread.title: Aditya Chopra begins `Befikre` preparations in Paris
thread.title_full: Aditya Chopra begins `Befikre` preparations in Paris

title: Aditya Chopra begins `Befikre` preparations in Paris
text: Aditya Chopra begins `Befikre` preparations in Paris Thursday, 22 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) * New Delhi , Oct.22 (ANI): Aditya Chopra, who is all set to make his directorial comeback with 'Befikre,' has started its preparations in Paris.* New Delhi, Oct.22 (ANI): Aditya Chopra, who is all set to make his directorial comeback with 'Befikre,' has started its preparations in Paris. Confirming the prepping news, the Yash Raj Films' official Facebook page posted a post, which shows inverted Eiffel Tower with official Yash Raj logo along with 'Befikre written it'. The post reads, "20th October, 2015: It was on this day 20 years ago that Aditya Chopra's debut movie released and on this very day exactly 20 years later the official prep work for Aditya Chopra's next ?#?Befikre began in Paris. What a coincidence of timing of this exact date!" Earlier, the 44-year-old director announced about his latest venture in a special note on his father Yash Chopra's 83rd birth anniversary on September 27, 2015. The film will star Ranveer Singh and Vaani Kapoor in the prominent roles.(ANI)
